# Template Name: Single File
Description: A empty single file template

## Directories

## Files

### {projectName}.bas
```nextbuild
' Project: {projectName}
' Type: Simple Empty Template
' Generated by NextBuild Project Creator

'!org=$8000

#define NEX 
#define IM2

' Include NextLib
#include "nextlib.bas"

' Variables go here 
dim     x as ubyte = 0
dim     y as ubyte = 0

' Initialise here 
MainInit()

' Main loop
do 

    ' Wait for raster line 192
    WaitRaster(192)

loop 

'----------------------------------------------------------
' Subroutines go here

sub MainInit()
    ' if using ULA 
    border 0 : paper 0 : ink 7 : cls 

    print at 0,0; "Welcome to {projectName}!"

end sub 


```
